message: I need to talk to an iPad TextExpander user. I really need that kind of functionality to get any work done on this damn glass screen, but the fact that it doesn't run in Safari basically kills my major use case, which would be Google Docs. Is it still a relatively smooth workflow to work INSIDE TextExpander and then copy/paste text out to other apps? Is there any risk of formatting errors or data loss? Really not sure whether this would be worthwhile
